entries.already_affected: You are already under the influence of that food.  Eating more won't enhance the effect.
entries.already_centered: You are already focusing on defense with this weapon.
entries.burst_run_no: You cannot burst run right now.
entries.burst_run_space_dungeon: The artificial gravity makes burst running impossible here.
entries.burst_run_wait: You are too tired to Burst Run.
entries.burst_run_wont_stick: You cannot burst run right now.
entries.cannot_use_force: You cannot perform force powers with this weapon.
entries.cant_stop_gallop_not_mounted: You can't stop galloping if you aren't mounted.
entries.cant_stop_galloping_not_galloping: You can't stop galloping if you aren't already galloping.
entries.center_start: You focus your thoughts on self preservation.
entries.center_stop: Your thoughts drift away from self preservation.
entries.dead_eye_active: The chemical infusion immediately begins to heighten your awareness, agility, and visual acuity.
entries.dead_eye_already: You are already under the effects of Dead Eye.
entries.dead_eye_wait: You took Dead Eye too recently.  An overdose could cause neurological damage.
entries.delay_notify: You duck for cover from %TT's wild shooting!  Your next action is delayed for %DI seconds.
entries.dupe_skill_mod: You cannot buff %TO because it is already increased by a different effect.
entries.effect_not_hold: The effect did not take hold.
entries.feign_no_combat: You must be in combat to feign death.
entries.food_mind_heal: You feel refreshed.  %DI points of mind damage have been healed.
entries.gallop_start: Your mount runs as fast as it can.
entries.gallop_stop: Your mount is winded and slows down.
entries.hit_by_mine_detonation: You have triggered a mine and taken %DI points of damage.
entries.immune_to_effect: The Target is immune to such an effect.
entries.instant_burst_run: You instantly burst run at increased efficiency!
entries.mitigate_damage: %DI damage was mitigated by defensive buffs!
entries.mount_not_tired: Your mount is no longer winded.
entries.mount_slow_for_combat: Your mount slows down to prepare for combat.
entries.mount_tired: Your mount is too tired to gallop.
entries.no_additional_effect: The food has no additional effect on you.
entries.no_combat_while_driving: You cannot attack or react to an attack while driving.
entries.no_combat_while_galloping: You cannot attack or react to an attack while galloping. Use /gallopStop to stop galloping.
entries.no_proficiency: You lack the necessary skills to use this weapon properly.  Damage with this weapon will be greatly reduced.
entries.no_target_for_buddy: It does not appear that you need assistance in combat.
entries.not_group_leader: You must be the group leader to perform this command.
entries.not_in_city: You cannot do that while in a city.
entries.not_in_group: You must be in a group to perform this command.
entries.not_indoors: You cannot do that while indoors.
entries.not_mounted: You cannot perform this command without a mount.
entries.prone_ranged_too_close: You are too close to attack with a ranged weapon in this posture.
entries.slow_dot_done: The remaining duration of DOTs affecting you have been reduced by %DI%.
entries.slow_dot_wait: You need to wait 15 minutes between DOT slow attempts.
entries.smuggler_buddy_goodbye: Alright, %TU. Now we're even. I'm outta here.
entries.smuggler_buddy_greeting: Don't worry, %TU. I'm here to help.
entries.strafe_system: You have been forced from cover and delayed by a strafing attack.
entries.string_too_long: That string is too long and has been shortened.
entries.supply_drop_comm: Roger that.  Starting supply drop-off sequence.
entries.weapon_half: Your weapon has less than 50% condition remaining.
entries.weapon_mode_change_1_melee: Your weapon has been successfully switched to mode 1 (Vibratory Pulse).
entries.weapon_mode_change_1_ranged: Your weapon has been successfully switched to mode 1 (Pulsed Discharge).
entries.weapon_mode_change_2_melee: Your weapon has been successfully switched to mode 2 (Standard Impact).
entries.weapon_mode_change_2_ranged: Your weapon has been successfully switched to mode 1 (Sustained Volley).
entries.weapon_mode_change_4_melee: Your weapon has been successfully switched to mode 3 (High Velocity Impact).
entries.weapon_mode_change_4_ranged: Your weapon has been successfully switched to mode 1 (Focused Burst).
entries.weapon_mode_change_general_failure: Unable to switch weapon attack mode with the command parameters provided.
entries.weapon_mode_change_invalid: That weapon cannot be switched to the indicated mode!
entries.weapon_mode_change_no_eq: You must have a weapon equipped to "Change Attack Mode" in this manner.
entries.weapon_mode_change_no_exist: Cannot change attack mode on a weapon that no longer exists!
entries.weapon_mode_change_no_mode: You must indicate a valid attack mode to change this weapon to.
entries.weapon_mode_change_not_owner: You must be in possession of that weapon to change its attack mode.
entries.weapon_mode_change_redundant: That weapon is already operating at the desired mode.
entries.weapon_mode_switch_one_mode: That weapon only has one valid attack mode, hence you cannot change it.
entries.weapon_quarter: Your weapon has less than 25% condition remaining.
entries.wearing_armor_fly: You can not use that skill while wearing armor
entries.smuggler_medic_greeting_1: I've got a medkit, %TU!  Help is here!
entries.smuggler_medic_greeting_2: My patients need me, %TU!  Let's make this quick!
entries.smuggler_medic_greeting_3: What seems to be the problem, %TU?
entries.smuggler_medic_greeting_4: My stims are up to the challenge, %TU!
entries.smuggler_medic_greeting_5: I hate house calls, %TU.  This is one favor I won't forget.
entries.smuggler_medic_goodbye_1: The trauma seems light, %TU, so I'll be seeing you!
entries.smuggler_medic_goodbye_2: My bedside manner has never been at its finest, %TU!
entries.smuggler_medic_goodbye_3: I'm a doctor, not a commando, %TU!
entries.smuggler_medic_goodbye_4: *Beep Beep* Oh!  My comlink!  A medic's job is never done, %TU!
entries.smuggler_medic_goodbye_5: I'm a doctor, not a performer, %TU!
entries.smuggler_medic_goodbye_6: Make sure you take plenty of fluids the next time, %TU!
entries.not_in_instance: You cannot do that at this location.
